"}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Whom to Contact:", "bold": true, "underline": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "District Agriculture Officers of the concerned districts"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Sub-Divisional Agricultural Officers of the concerned sub-divisions"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "District Training Officers, Tura/Shillong"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Agricultural Development Officers of the concerned Community and Rural Development Blocks"}]}]}]}], "process_md": "> **Application Process:**

To avail of the benefits of the scheme, the bonafide farmers can approach the nearest Agriculture Development Officer of a Community Development Block/Agriculture Circle. 
> **Mode of Selection of Beneficiary(s):**

The bonafide farmers shall be selected on a first come first serve basis. 
> **Whom to Contact:**


 1.
